notes: 01 and 03 preserve pose; 02 too realistic / not cute. 03 best overall.
best_prompt: Use the photo as a strict composition reference: preserve the silhouette, pose, and framing without adding or swapping limbs. If only part of the body is visible, keep only that visible portion. Convert to adorable chibi-style, very-low-resolution pixel art in a bead-grid style with solid bright colors, no gradients, and no background.

notes: 01: background white ok but pose/crop wrong and not low-res. 02: low-res but background not pure white and pose/crop wrong. 03 worst overall.
Round 3 still worse than Round 1 variant 03; none beat R1-03.
01 ok: pose direction correct, pixel-art style. 02 bead-style and direction wrong. 03 direction wrong and ugly.
